body:
Hi Avicus,

Raikkou and I want to make a map.
We were asking ourself which gamemode it should be.
Is there any gamemode requested?
body_tagged:
Hi Avicus,

Raikkou and I want to make a map.
We were asking ourself which gamemode it should be.
Is there any gamemode requested?
title: Map Gamemode

replies.body:
DTE (electro), CTW, CTF...
Practically any game except DTM is needed
replies.body_tagged:
DTE (electro), CTW, CTF...
Practically any game except DTM is needed

replies.body: We should add Deathrun where are archers shooting and playirs running till to the end and no respawns. And a new maps for deathmatch and destroy thr core and maps where you make tnt cannons
replies.body_tagged: We should add Deathrun where are archers shooting and playirs running till to the end and no respawns. And a new maps for deathmatch and destroy thr core and maps where you make tnt cannons

replies.body:
Sorry to bump, but I am currently in the process of making a map with Mels and others.

What exactly is DTE?
replies.body_tagged:
Sorry to bump, but I am currently in the process of making a map with Mels and others.

What exactly is DTE?

replies.body:
Destroy the Environment. It's where you and the other team have to destroy the other side at a certain percentage.

Or like a specific landmark(s) that's part of the map that needs to be destroyed. Databasin and many other maps are great examples of these.

If you're going to make it the whole island, I'd suggest making the percentage for completion < 25%.

A landmark can be < 75%
